answers.answer: Hi,How are you?There can be many causes of tightness in the arm. It can be due to nerve compression, peripheral vascular disease, and peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes or vitamin B12 deficiency.Please get yourself evaluated by your physician. Take care!

I've had the same thing. I'm waiting to hear back from the doctor. They think it's a pinched nerve. There's so many things it could be. If you have any chest pain along with the arm pain, please get seen right away. Only your doctor will really be able to pinpoint what's going on. Best wishes.April

question: my left arm gets tight sometimes what should I do
title: arm pajn
